description: The attributes that describe information specific to virtual machines.
caption: Virtual Machine
name: virtual_machine

vm_name.description: The name of the virtual machine.

vm_operating_system.description: The operating system running on the virtual machine.

vm_cpu_cores.description: The number of CPU cores allocated to the virtual machine.

vm_memory.description: The amount of memory allocated to the virtual machine in bytes or a human-readable format.

vm_disk_size.description: The size of the virtual machine's disk in bytes or a human-readable format.

vm_network_interface.description: The network interface configuration of the virtual machine.

vm_availability_zone.description: The availability zone in which the virtual machine is deployed.

vm_tags.description: A set of tags or labels associated with the virtual machine for categorization and management purposes.
